import studio from'@theatre/studio';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getProject}from'@theatre/core';import{renderFontObject,renderImageObject,renderBgObject}from'../utils';import Stage from'../components/stage';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function DemoVideo(){studio.initialize();studio.ui.hide();var project=getProject('Project',{});var sheet=project.sheet('Scene','default');project.ready.then(function(){return sheet.sequence.play({iterationCount:Infinity});});// get objectJSON in local-storage
